title: Crashing Souls
description: Given a second chance to find the love of his life after a tragic accident, a man finds himself taking over the life of a teenager named Dexter. But there are rules: She will not remember him and he will only have fragmented memories, not knowing anything about the life he has been placed in and barely anything about the life he once lived. But finding her is one thing, loving her and her self-destructive ways is another.Artful, sharp, and compelling, Crashing Souls explores the permanent mark left behind when two souls crash together.
author: Cynthia A. Rodriguez
